root.name: Artificial Girl 3
root.description: PC System RequirementsWindows 2000/XPDirectX 9.0c or higherPentium 4 2.0 GHz or higher (3.0Ghz recommended)512 MB RAM (1 GB recommended)8 Gigs of free hard drive spaceA graphics card compliant with DirectX 9.0c (support for shader 2.0 recommended)64 MB graphics memory (256 MB recommended)1024x768 resolution
